game.name: The Interval Bureau: Extension 0
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A short psychological audio horror call where every number routes you deeper into a faceless bureau that measures and files you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A short psychological audio horror call where every number routes you deeper into a faceless bureau that measures and files you.
